metaData.title: Hamsa Tech checkout Page
metaData.description: Securely complete your purchase for surveillance cameras, POS systems, access control, and more at Hamsa Tec. Choose from a variety of payment options, including card, wallet, or installments.

content.orderSuccessMessage: Thank you for your purchase! Your order will be processed within 24 hours during working days. We will notify you by email once your order has been shipped.

metaData.title: Hamsa Tech Support
